channel.title: Abouts on Eric Daniel Fournier
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Eric Daniel Fournier

item.title: About
item.description: ##Name## Eric Daniel Fournier ##Education## Loyola High School (2004) School for International Training, Zanzibar (2008) - Coastal Ecology Field Research Program Bucknell University (2008) - Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies (2010) - Master of Environmental Science University of California at Santa Barbara (2014) - Master of Arts in Geography University of California at Santa Barbara (2015) - Doctor of Philosophy in Environmental Science
